nytimes.topComment: Well, the citizens of Wisconsin get to test the old adage, if you think that education is expensive, try ignorance! Walker is another panderer-supreme. That someone so unimpressive and vacuous can be taken as a serious contender is a shameful comment...

nytimes.title: Maureen Dowd: Call Off the Dogs
nytimes.topComment: I can't imagine the horror of a Republican winning the White House, but neither can I stand the thought of a Hillary candidacy. It wears me out just thinking about it. I could swallow the dirty tricks, and I understand that politics is a vicious, rut...
